```{r load packages, message=FALSE}
library(biomaRt)
library(Biostrings)
```


```{r}
mmart <- useMart(biomart = "ensembl", dataset = "mmusculus_gene_ensembl")
```

```
PDGFRA: 18595, Pdgfra
```

```{r}
pdgfra <- "18595"
```


```{r}
listAttributes(mmart, page = "sequences")
```

```{r}
listFilters(mmart)
```


```{r}
pdgfra_seq <- getBM(attributes = c("entrezgene_id", "refseq_mrna"),
                    filters = "entrezgene_id",
                    values = pdgfra,
                    mart = mmart)
```

```{r}
supportedUCSCtables(genome = "mm10")
```


```{r}
mtxdb <- makeTxDbFromUCSC(genome = "mm10", tablename = "refGene")
```

```{r}
columns(mtxdb)
exons(x = mtxdb, filter = list(gene_id = "18595"), columns = c("GENEID", "TXID"))
```

```{r}
exonsBy(x = mtxdb, by = "tx")
```
